desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the Third International Conference on Security Standardisation Research, SSR 2016, held in Gaithersburg, MD, USA, in December 2016.

details.authors: Lidong Chen, David McGrew, Chris Mitchell

title: Security Standardisation Research: Third International Conference, SSR 2016, Gaithersburg, MD, USA, December 5-6, 2016, Proceedings (Lecture Notes in Computer Science)
